sentences.cn: 艾滋病是一种传染性疾病.

sentences.en: Communicable diseases have been a curse of mankind since time immemorial.
sentences.cn: 自古以来,某些传染性疾病就是人类的灾祸.

sentences.en: Eczema, allergic diseases are not communicable diseases.
sentences.cn: 湿疹是属于过敏性疾病,不是传染性疾病.

sentences.en: Have you ever been afflicted with a communicable disease of public health?
sentences.cn: 曾否患有慢性病、传染病或其他妨碍正常工作的疾病?

sentences.en: In Shanghai, syphilis is now the most commonly reported communicable disease.
sentences.cn: 在上海, 梅毒已成为最常见的传染病.

sentences.en: In this article, we study spreading process of SIS communicable disease with vaccination.
sentences.cn: 文中研究有接种SIS型传染病的发展规律.

sentences.en: Mental disorders increase risk for communicable and non - communicable diseases, and contribute to unintentional and intentional injury.
sentences.cn: 精神障碍增加了传染性疾病和 非 传染性疾病的危险, 并导致非故意伤害和故意伤害.

sentences.en: Most recently she served as assistant director - general for communicable diseases.
sentences.cn: 最近,她担任了传染病部门助理总干事.

sentences.en: Objective To study the best teaching method of communicable diseases nursing.
sentences.cn: 目的:研究《传染病护理学》教学的最佳方法.

sentences.en: Some communicable diseases are transmitted only through the agency of insects.
sentences.cn: 某些传染病只通过昆虫来传播.

sentences.en: Some communicable diseases are transmitted only through the agency of vermin or insects.
sentences.cn: 某些传染病只通过害虫和昆虫来传播.

sentences.en: The relationship between natural disasters and communicable diseases is frequently misconstrued.
sentences.cn: 人们常常误解自然灾害与传播性疾病之间的关系.

sentences.en: There are only two things a child will share willingly: communicable diseases and his mother's age.
sentences.cn: 只有两件事情是孩子自然而然分享的: 传染病和自己母亲的年龄.

sentences.en: We take environmental health measures to keep off communicable disease.
sentences.cn: 我们采取措施保护环境卫生以防止发生传染性疾病.

words.tran_cn: 交际的；爱说话的，健谈的；无隐讳交谈的
通知者；报导者；领受圣餐者

trans.tran_en: a communicable disease can be passed on to other people
